member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to Home | Chicken Racer Help

Chicken Racer Help

Having trouble with Chicken Racer? Don't worry. We have all the help you need here.

Just Select a Tab to view a different help topic.

 

.

member.name: P:MyRaceGame.My.Resources.Resources.howtoplay
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to How to Play | Chicken Racer Help

How to Play

To begin playing...

First Click a player name so that you can enter your own name.

After entering you own name. Type a bet into the betting boc for your player.

After you have entered a bet, you can click the Double Money button if you would like to try earn double money.

If you do try for double money the [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.CheckRaceConditions
member.summary: Makes each race random. Assings player name variables equal to Player label text. Calls a Sub Routine that checks if the race can start.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.CanRaceStart
member.summary: Checks to see if the race can start. Checks if each Player bet textBox contains a value. Calls 3 other subs that check other conditions before the race can start.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.CanAffordBet
member.summary: Checks the value of Each Player Bet from the bet textboxes. If a player bet is greater than the amount in their bank then display a message box informing the player they can't afford the bet. Also sets each PlayerStart boolean to true if their bet amount is lower or equal to the amount in their bank.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.PlayersReady
member.summary: Checks each PlayerStart boolean value. If all equal true then set raceCanStart boolean value to true. If not all values equal true then display a message box informing that not all players are ready. The raceCanStartBoolean is used to start the race.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.DisableOptions
member.summary: Checks if the amount of races needed to win is less than the number of races that have took place. If true then disables the radio buttons that change the number of races needed to win. If not then enable the radio buttons so the user can change the value.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.CheckWinAmount
member.summary: Checks each GamesToWin radio button and changes the gamesToWin variable accordingly.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.BeginRace
member.summary: Begins the race only if the raceCanStart boolean value equals true.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.GamesWon
member.summary: Checks to see if the amount of races won is equal to the number of races needed to win overall. Checks if each players win count is higher than the other players. Displays a messagebox informing players which player won. If no players won then it was a tie and shows players how many wins each player achieved.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.AfterWin
member.summary: The Sub Routine that is called when a player wins a race. Calls various Sub Routines that check if players are bankrupt, sets players odds, Resets Players locations for the next race and checks if players have raced the amount of races specified from the BestOf X radio buttons

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.RaceLogic.RaceRunning
member.summary: This is the Sub Routine that contains the logic while a race is in progress. It should be called in the tmrGameSpeed_Tick Event It sets the players position on screen and moves each player randomly. It also checks if a player has crossed the finished line and if so declares that player the winner and then updates the labels that display race win info.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.initialiseBanks
member.summary: Sets the players default bank balance and initialises each PlayerBank Variables.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.Bankrupt
member.summary: Checks each players bank balance. If they're bankrupt then disable their controls.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.isBettingEnabled
member.summary: Checks each players bank balance. If a players balance is less than or equal to 0 then disable the players betting textbox, else enable them.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.NoMoreBets
member.summary: If a race is in progress then disable the betting textboxes and disables the start race and reset buttons.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.ResetPlayerLocation
member.summary: Initialises each players default Position and then sets the players location to those Positions.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.ResetEverything
member.summary: Resets player locations, bank balances, race wins and also enables player controls if they were bankrupt.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.EnablePlayers
member.summary: Used to enable all Player Controls if they were disabled.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.ResetWins
member.summary: Resets all race win variables to 0.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.SetOdds
member.summary: Sets the Odds of each player using random numbers.

member.name: M:MyRaceGame.Player.ResetGuesses
member.summary: Resets each players guess for the double money mini game.
